definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Can2 ji2 ren2 Lian2 he2 hui4

sentences.english: Our factory has spared no cost to manufacture artificial limBs in order to serve disaBled people.
sentences.chinese: 本廠不惜工本製造假肢，爲殘疾人服務。

sentences.english: It is our bounden duty to help the disabled.
sentences.chinese: 幫助殘疾人是我們義不容辭的責任。

sentences.english: This document embodies the concern of the government for the deformity.
sentences.chinese: 這個文件體現了政府對殘疾人的關懷。

sentences.english: The hotel has special facilities for welcoming disabled people.
sentences.chinese: 這家旅館有專供殘疾人使用的設施。

sentences.english: The handicapped also include deaf - mutes and some brain paralysis amentia .
sentences.chinese: 殘疾人還包括聾啞人及部分腦癱智障患者。

sentences.english: And I will help invalids save their lives.
sentences.chinese: 我將幫忙殘疾人挽救他們的生命。

sentences.english: A smiling volunteer on crutches shows the way at Beijing's Xidan intersection.
sentences.chinese: 西單路口殘疾人志願者，拄着雙柺微笑指路。

sentences.english: Volunteer: Take it easy. The Expo will provide special services to disabled.
sentences.chinese: 志願者:請放心世博園區將爲殘疾人提供特別服務。

sentences.english: But now, any ill-treatment of abandonment is strictly prohibited by the law.
sentences.chinese: 現在，遺棄殘疾人被法律嚴令禁止。

sentences.english: ResultsThe realization rate of rehabilitation demands in Shanghai suburb was 81.
sentences.chinese: 結果郊縣殘疾人康復服務需求實現率爲81。

sentences.english: States Parties shall render appropriate assistance to persons with disabilities in the performance of their child-rearing responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 締約國應當適當協助殘疾人履行其養育子女的責任。

sentences.english: Even the handicapped were not hampered from a roll on the dance floor.
sentences.chinese: 即使是殘疾人也不礙事，他們也可以在舞場上轉動。

sentences.english: The Chinese Red Cross contributed a generous sum to the relief of the physically disabled.
sentences.chinese: 中國紅十字會慷慨捐贈一筆鉅款以救濟殘疾人。

sentences.english: The hotel provides non-smoking floor and specially designed rooms for disabled guests.
sentences.chinese: 酒店還設有不吸菸樓層和殘疾人房間。

sentences.english: In Sydney Paraplegic Olympics, he won a medal in archery.
sentences.chinese: 在悉尼殘疾人奧運會上，他贏得了箭術比賽的獎牌。

definition: disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal
disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
